response.overview: Opposites and More, a Parents' Choice Award Winning DVD, explores concepts critical to the advancement of your child's verbal & reasoning skills. The twenty words presented in this DVD are first introduced as ten "opposite pairs" using comparison & contrast to promote comprehension. Later, each word is presented as an independent concept in two entertaining stories and in a set of moving flash cards.  Ages 12 mos. & up
response.title: Bumblebee Kids - Opposites and More
